product_name: Werner Carve S Adjustable Stand Up Paddle
long_description: Answer the call of the waves with the Werner Carve S Stand Up Paddle. It features a small-size fiberglass blade for a high cadence paddling style and an adjustable length for multiple users. Suitable for multiple paddlers of different heights, the Werner Carve S Adjustable Stand Up Paddle telescopes to fit 2 size ranges: 74 - 81.5 in. and 80 - 87.5 in. Reduced surface area takes it easy on your joints and offers a faster stroke cadence, allowing you to accelerate and maneuver quickly to catch more waves. Lightweight fiberglass and carbon blend shaft offers light flex on every stroke and feels warm in the hands; oval shape of shaft increases overall control. Fiberglass-laminate blade provides lightweight power; long and slender profile turns responsively in surf and rough water. Long, rectangular blade offers nuanced power application; use the tip for a quick maneuverability and the entire blade for deep, forceful strokes. Durable T-shaped ABS palm grip fits naturally in your hand, refining control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: Answer the call of the waves with the Werner Carve S Stand Up Paddle. It features a small-size fiberglass blade for a high cadence paddling style and an adjustable length for multiple users.
